1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.8.0: Added support for creepers. Yes, they need armor for some reason.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.9.0: Added support for endermen. Their screams tend to go through head layers.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.10.0: Added support for all biped renderers. You can now see arrows in these mobs and a bit of armor for the vex.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.11.0: Added support for piglins. I forgot they existed as biped renderers.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.12.0: Added support for slimes...and magma cubes. Can't forget the magma cubes... Fixes vex legs not rendering correct for armor. Fixes an issue with the creeper head layer when skulls are applied.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.13.0: Definitely forgot about the magma cubes. Now there's magma cubes.
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.14.0: Code cleanup and hierarchy fixes. Switched from ATs to reflection storages for faster load times and better compatibility. Still need to implement ageable model difference AgeableModels. Also added that annoying update message. No worries, it can be disabled in the config :)
1.16.1.1.16.1-0.0.15.0: Implemented AgeableModel interface using Method storage via reflection. Restructured config to allow disabling of specific layers to change amount of resource allocation. Also added horses support.
